suggested_yarn: Lion Brand LB Collection Superwash Merino
full_text: These cozy baby blocks are the perfect toys for girls and boys. (Lion Brand Yarn) Lion Brand Pattern #: 90506AD CORRECTIONS: (applied Feb 8, 2010) SKILL LEVEL: Intermediate LB Collection® Superwash Merino (Article #486) 4 colors, 1 ball each Shown in Spring Leaf, Denim, Dijon, Ivory Materials are sufficient to make 3 blocks Knitting Needles - Size 5 [3.75 mm] Knitting Needles - Size 6 [4.00 mm] Cable Needle 3/4 yard (3/4 meter) of 45 in. (114.5 cm) washable cotton fabric Fiberfill stuffing Sewing needle and thread Knit blocks are assembled over inner fabric blocks, for which fabric squares are seamed together and stuffed. If desired, knit pieces can be assembled over foam blocks. You will need three foam blocks cut to 4-1/2 in. (11.5) cm square. Stitches: Cross Rib pattern - 10 rows (multiple of 7 sts + 1) Stockinette Stitch Garter Ridge Garter and Rib ’Star’ and letter ‘B’ are worked in duplicate stitch. Charts are provided. Some assembly required to finish.
name: Ravelry: Babycakes Blocks pattern by Lion Brand Yarn
